Name: PowerStarHalo
Notes: A large decorative light that is meant to be placed around a Power Star. It will disappear if the player is close enough, however, it will reappear again if the player leaves the disappearance range again.

Obj_arg0.Name: Disappearance Range
Obj_arg0.Description: The range in which it will disappear divided by 100. Default is 70.

Obj_arg1.Name: Don't Appear During Intro?
Obj_arg1.Description: If set, it won't appear during the intro cutscene of a level.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_DEAD.Description: Can be activated when the object is killed through a cutscene action.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

DemoCast.Description: Can take part in a cutscene.
